Greetings to Brazilian foreign minister 
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Celso Lafer, foreign minister of Brazil, on the occasion of the 180th anniversary of its independence.
 The message extended warm congratulations to him and wished him greater success in his responsible work.

articles.content:
Greetings to Brazilian President
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Fernando Henrique Cardoso, President of Brazil, on the occasion of the 180th anniversary of its independence.
 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the President and people of Brazil success in their work for the prosperity of the country.
